title.native: 劇場版 転生したらスライムだった件 紅蓮の絆編
title.romaji: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Guren no Kizuna-hen
title.english: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime the Movie: Scarlet Bond

description:
A long-running conspiracy is swirling over a mysterious power known as “Queen” in Raja, a small country west of Tempest. When a slime who evolved into a Demon Lord named Rimuru Tempest crosses paths with Hiiro, a survivor of the Ogre race, an incredible adventure packed with new characters begins. The power of bonds will be put to the test!

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime Movie
เกิดใหม่ทั้งทีก็เป็นสไลม์ไปซะแล้ว เดอะมูฟวี่
Lúc đó tôi đã chuyển sinh thành Slime: Mối Liên Kết Đỏ Thẫm
О моём перерождении в слизь: Алые узы

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Kingdom Management
tags.description: Characters in these series take on the responsibility of running a town or kingdom, whether they take control of an existing one, or build their own from the ground up.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Shapeshifting
tags.description: Features character(s) who changes one's appearance or form.

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: Philosophy
tags.description: Relating or devoted to the study of the fundamental nature of knowledge, reality, and existence.

tags.name: Monster Girl
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

tags.name: Afterlife
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the afterlife.

tags.name: Monster Boy
tags.description: Prominently features a male character who is a part-monster.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

tags.name: Goblin
tags.description: A goblin is a monstrous creature from European folklore. They are almost always small and grotesque, mischievous or outright malicious, and greedy. Sometimes with magical abilities.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

name.native: ヴェルドラ＝テンペスト

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Taiki_Kawakami)

Taiki Kawakami is a Japanese writer and artist.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/岡村天斎) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tensai_Okamura)

During his university days at Waseda University, Okamura was a part of Waseda's manga research society and together with other budding animators, produced his first independent anime there. Upon graduating from university, Okamura joined the animation production studio Madhouse as an animator through the recommendation of a friend. Lensman was the first series he worked on as an animator. The first anime movies that he worked on were Kamui no Ken and Bobby ni Kubittake. 

In 1989, he made his debut as an episode director with Yawara! and soon made his full directorial debut in 1995 with Memories. He later left Madhouse and went freelance, working on several projects along the way.

In 1991, he changed his first name from Yutaka to Tensai.
**Satoshi Oosedo** is a Japanese director, episode director and storyboard artist.

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/g_kurosaki1218) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/go.kurosaki.7)__

__Birthplace:__ Yokohama City, Kanagawa Prefecture, Japan

__Gou Kurosaki__ is a Japanese CG animator, director and artist affiliated with CG studio Sublimation.
